scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'POS' --prefix-colors 'orange,green' --kill-others 'cd client/ && bun dev --host' 'php artisan serve'
scripts.serve: concurrently --names 'POS' --prefix-colors 'orange,green' --kill-others 'cd client/ && bun dev --host' 'php artisan serve --host 192.168.254.195 --port 8000'
